title: Constantly disconnected from PVP.net
body: For some reason my client keeps disconnecting from PVP.net. In game my latency is fine. I'm with internode, and I have no idea what could be causing the issue. Does anyone know how to fix this?

replies.body:
I know that there was (relatively) some issues with the trace-route internode users had with connecting to riotgames.com, but I thought that was all patched up.

What OS are you on?
On Windows 7. It calmed down after like 20 min, but it's doing it again tonight. I'm still not sure what it is.
That *does* sound like an ISP issue. You might wanna call them up and ask about it.

same here.

Now i keep getting a 'the game you were spectating can not be found' or whatever when i find a game during queue
